statements: SELECT * FROM lead_interactions
SELECT lead_id, interaction_time FROM lead_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Email'
SELECT * FROM lead_interactions WHERE interaction_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY interaction_time DESC
SELECT communication_channel, COUNT(*) AS num_interactions FROM lead_interactions GROUP BY communication_channel ORDER BY num_interactions DESC
SELECT lead_id, interaction_type, communication_content FROM lead_interactions WHERE communication_channel = 'Phone'
SELECT * FROM lead_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Meeting' ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
SELECT lead_id, interaction_time, communication_channel FROM lead_interactions WHERE communication_channel = 'Email' LIMIT 10;
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(lead_id) AS interaction_count FROM lead_interactions GROUP BY interaction_type HAVING interaction_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM lead_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Call' AND communication_channel = 'Phone' ORDER BY interaction_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT lead_id, communication_content FROM lead_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Demo' OR interaction_type = 'Webinar';
SELECT * FROM lead_interactions;
SELECT lead_id, interaction_timestamp, interaction_type FROM lead_interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(*) FROM lead_interactions GROUP BY interaction_type;
SELECT * FROM lead_communications WHERE communication_channel = 'Email';
SELECT lead_id, communication_timestamp, communication_content FROM lead_communications ORDER BY communication_timestamp ASC;
SELECT lead_id, interaction_timestamp, interaction_type, interaction_details FROM lead_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'email';
SELECT * FROM lead_communications ORDER BY communication_timestamp DESC;
SELECT lead_id, interaction_type FROM lead_interactions WHERE interaction_type IN ('call', 'meeting') ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT communication_channel, communication_content FROM lead_communications WHERE lead_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM lead_interactions;
SELECT * FROM lead_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT lead_id, communication FROM lead_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Meeting';
SELECT * FROM lead_history WHERE lead_id = 1001;
SELECT follow_up_date, follow_up_status FROM lead_follow_up WHERE follow_up_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY follow_up_date ASC;
SELECT lead_id, interaction_type, communication FROM lead_interactions WHERE interaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM lead_interactions WHERE lead_id = 1
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_date FROM lead_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC
SELECT communication FROM lead_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Email' AND interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT lead_id, history_date, history_description FROM lead_history INNER JOIN lead_interactions ON lead_history.lead_id = lead_interactions.lead_id
SELECT * FROM lead_follow_up WHERE follow_up_status = 'Pending'
SELECT * FROM leads;
SELECT lead_name, lead_contact FROM leads WHERE lead_source = 'Website';
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_notes FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT communication_type, communication_channel FROM communications WHERE communication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT follow_up_date, follow_up_notes FROM follow_ups WHERE follow_up_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY follow_up_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM leads WHERE lead_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT lead_name, lead_contact FROM leads WHERE lead_source = 'Referral';
SELECT lead_name, lead_contact, lead_source FROM leads ORDER BY lead_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM interactions JOIN leads ON interactions.lead_id = leads.lead_id WHERE interaction_type = 'Meeting';
SELECT communication_type, communication_date, communication_channel FROM communications WHERE communication_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM lead_contacts LIMIT 10
SELECT lead_id, contact_date, contact_method FROM lead_contacts ORDER BY contact_date DESC
SELECT lead_id, contact_date, contact_method, contact_details FROM lead_contacts WHERE lead_id = 123
SELECT lead_id, interview_date, interviewer_name, interview_notes FROM lead_interviews ORDER BY interview_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT activity_id, lead_id, activity_date, activity_type FROM lead_activities
SELECT * FROM lead_contacts ORDER BY contact_date DESC;
SELECT lead_id, contact_method, contact_details FROM lead_contacts WHERE lead_id = 5;
SELECT lead_id, note_date, note_details FROM lead_notes WHERE note_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT lead_id, interviewer_name, interview_notes FROM lead_interviews WHERE lead_id = 10 ORDER BY interview_date ASC;
SELECT activity_id, lead_id, activity_type, activity_details FROM lead_activities WHERE activity_type LIKE '%meeting%' AND activity_date >= '2022-01-01';
